flight_definition.comment:
This is a template file for the xmlreader program. The template defines the data structure for flight aeromechanics analysis.
By Shuai Deng, Tsinghua University, 2014/3/25

typedef.name: flight_info
typedef.comment: The flight is classified by: 1 - hover 2 - low speed level flight 3 - high speed level flight 4 - turning flight 5 - autorotation
